text: Kniga, ayaty kotoroy otlichayutsya krasotoy sloga i slov pri ikh proiznoshenii. A smysl yeyo razlichayet istinu ot lzhi, dobruyu vest' ot uveshchevaniya. V nom (smysle) - nravstvennoye vospitaniye dlya dushi, pritchi, ustanovleniya. Eto Pisaniye, chitayemoye na arabskom yazyke, logko dlya ponimaniya tekh, kto yego znayet
